items.title: BSc in Software Engineering
details: Institution: U-TAD (University Center for Technology and Digital Art)
items.description: Currently in the final year of the Software Engineering degree with a specialization in Cybersecurity. Training focused on secure development, forensics, networking and distributed architectures.

items.title: Professional Internship at Capgemini
details: Role: Junior Consultant - BPM (Business Process Management)
items.description: Carrying out my internship at Capgemini, collaborating on the digitalization of business processes through BPM solutions. Experience in agile environments, automation and systems analysis.
